name: notebooklm-enterprise
description: An MCP Server for managing Google Cloud NotebookLM Enterprise notebooks and documents.
author: Google

settings.name: Project Number
settings.description: The Google Cloud Project Number where NotebookLM Enterprise is enabled (e.g. 1234567890).

settings.name: Data Store Location
settings.description: The Google Cloud location for your NotebookLM data store.
